column2: I'd like to officially welcome you to our village! Please come to me if you have any questions.
You know I have the power to banish you from this village? It wouldn't be hard.
This is no good. Keep it away.
Thank you for the gift! I'll be sure to keep care of it.
I'm quite busy at the moment, but thanks for dropping by.
column3: I will hand it to Father Trulian, he is a smart man, even if he is a bit overbearing.
column4: I used to live in the capital, you know. I... don't miss it.
